channel.title: asciinema on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in asciinema on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Creating an emacs mode for asciinema.org
item.description: Related articles Hacker News mode and minor modes for websites // Bodacious Blog This blog is about creating a minor mode for browsing asciinema.org and extending eww-mode to handle the video links. I use tmux from emacs to spawn a new window that starts the playback when a link is clicked. Demonstration Here, I use the asciinema mode for browsing and opening asciinema recordings from my blog.
